trans-unit.source: References <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> objects stored at a different location when using XMLDSIG or XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 引用<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>使用 XMLDSIG 或 XML 加密时存储在不同位置的对象。

trans-unit.source: The KeyInfoRetrievalMethod class represents the `<RetrievalMethod>` element for both XML encryption and XML digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: KeyInfoRetrievalMethod 类表示`<RetrievalMethod>`XML 加密和 XML 数字签名的元素。

trans-unit.source: Use the KeyInfoRetrievalMethod class to reference the same <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> information in multiple XMLDSIG signatures or encrypted XML documents, especially when the referenced information is large.
trans-unit.target: 使用 KeyInfoRetrievalMethod 类来引用相同<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>信息在多个 XMLDSIG 签名或加密的 XML 文档，尤其是当引用的信息较大时。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>

trans-unit.source: For example, a `<RetrievalMethod>` subelement can be used to reference a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoX509Data> object that contains an X.509v3 certificate chain, which validates the signing key.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`<RetrievalMethod>`可以使用子元素引用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoX509Data>对象，其中包含验证的签名密钥 X.509v3 证书链。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoX509Data>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `<RetrievalMethod>` element, see Section 4.4.3 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`<RetrievalMethod>`元素，请参阅 4.4.3 一部分 XMLDSIG 规范，这是可从在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)，或请参阅 XML 加密规范，这是可从在 www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/ W3C。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> class with the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) pointing to the referenced <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref>类与指定统一资源标识符 (URI) 指向引用<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the information to be referenced by the new instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 统一资源标识符 (URI) 的信息的新实例引用<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> class with the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) pointing to the referenced <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object and the URI that describes the type of data to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref>类与指定统一资源标识符 (URI) 指向引用<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>对象和用于描述要检索的数据类型的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the information to be referenced by the new instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 统一资源标识符 (URI) 的信息的新实例引用<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The URI that describes the type of data to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 用于描述要检索的数据类型的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回的 XML 表示形式<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> object returned by this method is suitable for use as a subelement of an XMLDSIG or XML encryption `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>此方法返回的对象是适合用作 XMLDSIG 或 XML 加密的子元素`<KeyInfo>`元素。</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: The XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: XML 表示形式<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Parses the input <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object and configures the internal state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> object to match.
trans-unit.target: 分析输入<xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref>对象和配置的内部状态<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref>相匹配的对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used to process a `<RetrievalMethod>` subelement of a `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: 通常使用此方法到进程`<RetrievalMethod>`的子元素`<KeyInfo>`元素。

trans-unit.source: The XML element that specifies the state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定的状态的 XML 元素<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The value parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the type of data to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个统一资源标识符 (URI)，描述要检索的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the type of data to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 描述要检索的数据类型统一资源标识符 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的统一资源标识符 (URI) <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 统一资源标识符 (URI) <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod"> </xref>对象。
